thread.title: Worth a visit
thread.title_full: Worth a visit - Review of Apex Temple Court Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jubstie
title: Worth a visit
text: Our party of six returned to this hotel for a second time as it is near to Aldych Theatre where we were going to see a show. We were impressed the first time we stayed and were not disappointed again. The only grumble that we had was with the very complicated way the breakfast system works which the poor waitresses have to spend ages explaining to everyone. Get your act together. There is no need for such a silly way to do things. Why not a straightforward price for either an English breakfast or a Continental one???!!
